name: React JS
description: Full Stack Software Development covering modern web technologies, frameworks, and best practices in building scalable applications.

name: Poker
description: An exploration of games of chance and skill, focusing on poker strategy, probability, game theory, and psychological aspects of competitive play.

name: Woodwinds
description: A detailed study of woodwind instruments with a primary focus on flutes, including their history, construction, and playing techniques.

name: Soccer
description: An in-depth analysis of Zinedine Zidane's career, exploring his techniques, tactics, and impact on modern soccer.

name: Chemistry
description: A study of chemical reactions with a focus on energetic and explosive processes, exploring thermodynamics and reaction mechanisms.

name: Crochet
description: An introduction to the art of crochet, with a focus on creating Amigurumi, small stuffed yarn creatures inspired by Japanese techniques.

name: Anime
description: A critical analysis of protagonist plot armor in anime, examining storytelling techniques, tropes, and their impact on narrative structures.
